Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add AI Judgment Criteria Management page \(/specs/management\)

Implemented comprehensive 3-panel layout for managing customer spec judgment criteria:

Features:
- Left panel: Customer Specs list \(customer, category3, customized, rms_rev\)
- Center panel: Defect Types list with Export CSV functionality
  - Displays AI_Code, Side, Unit_Dummy, Area, Defect Name, Multiple, Threshold_OK
  - Image management placeholders for defect images and reference images
- Right panel: Specifications hierarchy \(collapsible/expandable\)
  - Defect Conditions with machine type, metal value percent
  - Measurement Conditions with measurement names and operators
  - Specifications \(recursive\) with expressions and sub-specifications
  
Technical:
- React/TypeScript with Next.js App Router
- Client-side data fetching from existing backend API endpoints
- Collapsible sections using ChevronDown/ChevronRight icons
- Click handlers for selecting specs and defect types
- CSV export functionality for defect types
- Responsive 3-column grid layout
- Integrated with existing Tailwind design system

Backend Integration:
- Uses /api/v1/customer-spec/search-specs endpoint
- Uses /api/v1/customer-spec/spec/{spec_id} endpoint
- Uses /api/v1/customer-spec/defect-type/{defect_type_id} endpoint
- Added getStats\(\) function to customer-spec API client

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
